Regional Officer for Palestine, Syria and the Lebanon. Miss Z. Bargna Acting Regional Officer for Egypt and the Sudan.

location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 7312/46 'List of Officials in the Middle East Dept of the British Council'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 4; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains a letter from the British Council to the India Office listing the officials in the Councilâ€™s Middle East Department.
